title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance without any webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: The expected behavior is that when accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance without any webapps deployed, the server should return an HTTP error 404.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Download http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed
3. Access a URL on the Tomcat server
Expected result: The server should return an HTTP error 404.
